user_query: I'm planning a business trip to London and I need to find a hotel. Can you search for available hotels in London for the dates 2023-09-26 to 2023-09-27? Also, provide me with the details of the hotels including the number of rooms required and the number of adult guests. Additionally, find the distance between Birmingham, AL, US and Sacramento, CA, US in kilometers.

TaskList.description: Search for available hotels in London for the dates 2023-09-26 to 2023-09-27.
Retrieve details of the available hotels including the number of rooms required and the number of adult guests.
Calculate the distance between Birmingham, AL, US and Sacramento, CA, US in kilometers.
